full_summary:
### Expansion Joints
#### Solicitation W8482-230856/A

**Tender Details**

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (Category III – 11)
* **Notice Type**: Commodity - Industrial/Scientific/Technical
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement.

**Tender Overview**
The Department of National Defence issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of expansion joints to be delivered to CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt.

**Deliverables**

* Item 1: 9 units of expansion joint, NSN: 99-823-9649
* Item 2: 18 units of expansion joint, NSN: 99-823-9649
* Item 3: 5 units of expansion joint, NSN: 99-660-2350
* Item 4: 15 units of expansion joint, NSN: 99-660-2350

**Bidder Requirements**

* Bidders may submit their proposals in either English or French.
* Bidders must provide the brand name and model, and/or Part Number, and the NCAGE they are offering.
* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
* Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

**Due Dates**

* **Closing Date**: [2022-10-17T14:00:00]
* **Amendment Date**: [2022-10-05]

**Contract Information**

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (Category III – 11)
* **Contact**: [Chelsea Fowler](mailto:chelsea.fowler@forces.gc.ca) - 819-939-3627

**Document Attachments**

* English RFP: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/22/6666c6380aa411bb18baef0f450cbc4b/english_rfp_230856.pdf
* French RFP: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/22/9a1e2a47e051f007a
